thread.section_title: Hotel Turenne Le Marais - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfectly located hotel in the heart of Paris
thread.title_full: Perfectly located hotel in the heart of Paris - Review of Hotel Turenne Le Marais, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Johannes T
title: Perfectly located hotel in the heart of Paris
text: Hotel Turenne is a small gem in the heart of Paris, located in Marais with walking distance to all the bars, resturants and shops in Marais. The rooms are small, as they often are in Paris, but perfect. The staff at Marais is super friendly and extremly helpful. The rooms on the fifth floor have a small balcony with a lovely view.
